description: Engineered multiple cross-platform applications for clubs, streamlining overall operations — reducing manual work and enhancing operational transparency.
Developed whatsapp bots, reduced server calls and overhead for a better and faster experience
Built and integrated deeplinks in Flutter for in-app features enhancing user navigation.
Debugged and optimized a production-grade web application built with Flask and Docker, deployed on AWS EC2.
Implemented the golden flow for capturing B2B quotation requests, improving lead management efficiency and aligning with business requirements.
Configured and managed DNS and Nginx as a reverse proxy, enhancing domain routing, SSL handling, and reducing manual deployment overhead.
Developed a cross-platform IoT application for air purifiers, enabling users to control devices, fan speed and monitor air quality in real-time through an intuitive interface.
Implemented data visualization dashboards to display air quality metrics, helping users track performance and make informed decisions.
